pageTitle: Bill Payment, Online Bill Pay Services - Citibank India
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {2950=Please Note: Bank is associated with the Prime Minister's National Relief Fund(PMNRF) as a Collection Bank. All donations towards the PMNRF on Citibank Online Bill Pay are notified for 100% deduction from taxable income under 80G of the Income Tax Act, 1961. To donate, LOGIN and select BILL PAY link in the left panel under BANKING or CREDIT CARD.}
